scene:
Cosmo Canyon - Nanaki
Arrival at Cosmo Canyon Exploring Cosmo Canyon Bugenhagen and His Machine Around the Cosmo Candle The Gi Cave Leaving Cosmo Canyon
The party may choose to stop at Cosmo Canyon, but if they attempt to bypass it instead, the buggy sparks. Cloud!? It continues to spark and then breaks down. Cloud gets out. CloudOh man... a breakdown? Now? They head to the nearby village of Cosmo Canyon in search of a mechanic. Red XIII runs ahead when they reach the gate. Red XIIII am home! It is I, Nanaki! GatekeeperHey, Nanaki! You're safe!Come on, and say hello to Bugenhagen! Red XIII runs on up a staircase along the side of the canyon. Cloud...Nanaki? BarretI finally made it... So this is... Cosmo Canyon! AerithCosmo... Canyon? I wonder if there's any relation to the planet or the Ancients... TifaRed XIII seems different, doesn't he? YuffieHmmm... Any Materia? Any Materia around? Cait SithHmmm... So this is Cosmo Canyon. Cloud and the others approach the gate. GatekeeperWelcome to Cosmo Canyon. Are you familiar with this land? Cloud- Yes- No
Yes GatekeeperYou lied. That is something that is not treated lightly here in Cosmo Canyon.
No GatekeeperLet me explain.People from all over the world gather here to seek the Study of Planet Life.
BarretWooooooooo!I always wanted to come here! GatekeeperUmmgah! It's full capacity at present, so I'm afraid I can't let you enter. Red XIII comes back down the stairs. Red XIIIThey helped me some when I was on the road. Please let them in. Gatekeeper...Oh, is that so? You helped our Nanaki? Please, come in. CloudWho is Nanaki? GatekeeperNanaki is Nanaki. That's his name. * Note: From this point on, that's how I'll refer to him. It's his name, after all. GatekeeperWelcome to Cosmo Canyon. Make yourselves at home. Cloud and the others enter the village and go up to where Nanaki is waiting on the stairway landing. NanakiHere is where I was... I mean, ...this is my hometown.My tribe were protectors of those who appreciate this beautiful canyon and the Planet.My brave mother fought and died here, but my cowardly father left her...... I am the last of my race. CloudCowardly father? NanakiYes. My father was a wastrel.And so the mission I inherited from my ancestors, is to protect this place. My journey ends here. Bugenhagen (from above)Hey! Nanaki--! You're home! NanakiComing, Grandpa! He dashes off up the stairs.
BarretGood timin'. Let's take a breather.I got stuff I want to find out, too. AerithLet's rest for a bit. There are some things I want to find out about anyway. TifaThat's perfect. Why don't we take a break too? We can meet back here in a while, OK? YuffieRest, rest, rest! I wanna rest! There! It's decided! Cait SithI'm just dead tired. Everyone, how 'bout some rest?
The others all wander off. SignTasty Cocktails! Pub "Starlet"Fluffy Beds! In "Shildra Inn"Come in today!It's right near Cosmo Candle! Cloud finds Tifa and Aerith at the pub. BarkeeperWelcome. How 'bout our original cocktail, 'Cosmo Candle?'A drink now and then is good for you. It'll relax you a bit. ...If you know when to stop. AerithMaybe there are some people here that know about the Promised Land and the Ancients. TifaNanaki...... I wonder what's happened to Nanaki...? He's as excited as a little boy. Elder BugahIs that so? You brought Nanaki back here?Yeah, thanks. Upstairs is the inn. InnkeeperWelcome to 'Shildra Inn'.It'll be 100 gil a night. Would you like to stay? Cloud- Yes- No thanks
Yes InnkeeperHave a great dream of the stars... After spending the night... InnkeeperWere you able to hear the stars whispers?Well then, please come again.
No thanks InnkeeperWell then, please come again.
Flyer on Wall[Turtle's Paradise] No. 5Our cocktails are good but our wine is the best!Please stop in to "Turtle's Paradise"!! Back outside... ManSo this is Cosmo Canyon... Quite a mysterious place.Have you come to seek the 'Study of Planet Life'? Cloud- That's it- No
That's it ManYeah? I heard there's an awesome observatory here. I'd like to see it if I have a chance.
No
If the buggy broke down... ManOh yeah? What? The car broke down!?Why don't you look around Cosmo Canyon, while I fix the car? He walks out through the gate.
If Cloud and the others chose to stop... ManOh, really?There really isn't much else to see here.
Kid near the Cosmo CandleYaaay! Nanaki! Nanaki's back! It's all thanks to this flame!This fire is called 'Cosmo Candle'. It has burned for generations.It is a holy flame that protects this canyon.I heard once, it only went out once, long ago.The elders said something horrifying occurred, but I really don't know much about it. GatekeeperSince you're here, why don't you listen to Bugenhagen's story? At the Tiger Lily Weapons shop... Weapons ShopkeeperOh, welcome.The people of this canyon hate to compete. So almost everything here are replicas.But that's all right. Some of them you can really use. Flyer on wall[Turtle Paradise Newsletter] Number 4Now hiring!Looking for someone who can stand long hours of boredom!For details, contact Pub "Turtle Paradise"!! In the Elder's Room... Elder HargoWhere did I put it...? I know it's around here... BarretThere was this guy who studied 'Planetary Life' here.He couldn't take things the way they were, so he went to Midgar to form AVALANCHE.Wanna hear more? Cloud- Go on BarretGuess you could say this is where AVALANCHE was born.I always wanted to come here... And... I finally...... made it.A lot... happened... Cloud- And then? BarretAnd then...? I don't know what's going to happen, now that there is no AVALANCHE... In the Materia shop... YuffieOh man! This place looks like a real drag. And their Materia sucks, too. Materia Shopkeeper...num... yawn... Sir,... You... forgot...... your...... change....num... Yes, I'm coming...Are you here to shop? Cloud- That's right- No, what's your problem?
That's right Materia ShopkeeperOh... is that so... You're here to shop? He jumps up. I'm sorry! We hardly ever get any customers so...... Oh, but I DO have confidence in our materia!I'm... I'm so sorry! It seems as though I've become so used to being lazy...
No, what's your problem? ShopkeeperOh... is that so... then leave me alone and let me... yawn... sleep...
Inside a woman's living quarters... WomanOh man, I'm so busy. I need more help. Mummer... complaint... If Cait Sith is in the party... WomanThose two... uh, Anyway, are you two friends? It really seems strange. Cait SithHmm, this place seems like it has a lot of secrets.So, when's dinner? WomanAll right, all right. I'm making it right now....But I wonder which one is going to eat... Kid outside Sealed DoorBugenhagen sealed this door shut.How'd he do that? With super glue? Cloud continues on up to the observatory, where Nanaki and Bugenhagen are. NanakiCloud, this is my grandfather, Bugen.He is incredible. He knows everything. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. I hear that you looked after Nanaki a bit.Nanaki is still a child you see. NanakiPlease stop, grandfather. I'm 48. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Nanaki's tribe has incredible longevity.So you see his 48 years would only be equivalent to say that of a 15 or 16 year old in human reckoning. Cloud15 or 16!? BugenhagenHe's quiet and very deep. You thought he was an adult? Nanaki......grandfather. I want to be an adult.I want to grow up to be able to protect you and the village. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. No Nanaki. You can't stand on your own yet.To do that now would destroy you in the long run.Reaching up into the heavens, threatening to snatch the very stars from the great city of Midgar. You've seen it, haven't you?Well, that's a bad example. Looking up too much makes you lose perspective.When it's time for this planet to die, you'll understand that you know absolutely nothing. Cloud......When the planet dies? BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. It may be tomorrow, or 100 years from now... But it's not long off. CloudHow do you know this? BugenhagenI hear the cries of the Planet. A throbbing noise starts up. CloudWhat's that? BugenhagenThe sounds of the stars in the heavens. While this goes on, planets are born, and die. A keening noise joins the throbbing. CloudWhat was that? BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. That was a scream from this planet.Didn't you hear it? As if to say... I hurt, I suffer...... NanakiThey have come here on a journey to save the planet.Why don't you show them your apparatus? BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. To save the planet? Ho Ho Hoooo!But, then again, I guess it wouldn't hurt to show him. Kid (walking in)Bugenhagen!Several odd looking people have come. BugenhagenThe whole place has gotten busy all of a sudden. NanakiHe brought friends too. I'll go get them. Nanaki starts for the door. Cloud, please call one of them.Only three people can fit in grandfather's machine. BugenhagenDon't worry. My machine won't run away. You go and invite your friends. Cloud runs off to invite someone. BarretWhat? AerithHmm? TifaAre you going somewhere? Nanaki (in his room)Don't worry about me. I've seen it many times.It's my first time back in a while. Let me rest for a bit... YuffieGod. I HATE studying! Cait SithWhat did they say? GatekeeperDid you get to see Bugenhagen's contraption? If you haven't yet, you must! Back to the observatory... BugenhagenHere, over here. The door's unlocked, come on in. Cloud enters the room housing the machine. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. It looks like you have them all together. Then let's begin.I'll be stand there. Cloud gets on the machine, and Bugenhagen switches it on. The platform lifts, taking them up to an interactive model of the solar system.
BarretThis is really somethin'! AerithSo pretty... It's just like the real thing! TifaWow! It's just like the real thing! YuffieWoa! Wooooah! Pretty good, surprisin' me!
BugenhagenHmm, yes pretty good. This is my laboratory.All the workings of space are entered into this 3D Holographic System.
BarretWhoa! Shootin' stars! AerithHey! A shooting star! TifaLook, look! A shooting star! YuffieWh, what the? A shooting star?
Cloud and the others watch the model for a while.
BarretThis's really somethin'! AerithWow, how wonderful. TifaOh! This is amazing!! YuffieWhew!!
BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Yes, it is something, isn't it?Well, let's get to the subject.Eventually... all humans die. What happens to them after they die?The body decomposes, and returns to the Planet. That much everyone knows. What about their consciousness, their hearts and their souls?The soul too returns to the Planet.And not only those of humans, but everything on this Planet. In fact, all living things in the universe, are the same.The spirits that return to the Planet, merge with one another and roam the Planet.They roam, converge, and divide, becoming a swell, called the 'Lifestream'.Lifestream... In other words, a path of energy of the souls roaming the Planet.'Spirit Energy' is a word that you should never forget.A new life... children are blessed with Spirit energy and are brought into the world.Then, the time comes when they die and once again return to the Planet...Of course there are exceptions, but this is the way of the world.I've digressed, but you'll understand better if you watch this. On the Planet model, a man is born, and dies. His spirit energy enters the Lifestream and forms a tree elsewhere. The tree dies and returns to the Lifestream. A new man is born, and dies, etc. Eventually the Lifestream covers the entire Planet. BugenhagenSpirit energy makes all things possible, trees, birds, and humans.Not just living things. But spirit energy makes it possible for Planets to be Planets.What happens if that energy were to disappear? Bugenhagen takes all the Spirit energy away and the Planet crumbles and dies. Bugenhagen......These are the basics of the Study of Planet Life. CloudIf the Spirit energy is lost, our Planet is destroyed... BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Spirit energy is efficient BECAUSE it exists within nature.When Spirit energy is forcefully extracted, and manufactured, it can't accomplish its true purpose. CloudYou're talking about Mako energy, right? BugenhagenEveryday Mako reactors suck up Spirit energy, diminishing it.Spirit energy gets compressed in the reactors and processed into Mako energy. All living things are being used up and thrown away.In other words, Mako energy will only destroy the Planet... He turns off the machine. The story of the planets... and those who lived with them...You want to know more? Then you must listen to the words of the elders.Nanaki? His father a coward?So that's it... Nanaki's been thinking that all this time... Cloud and the others leave to explore the place further. Elder HargoAhh, here it is.My job is to gather all the legends and the knowledge of the planet and to make a book.Then, even when I return to the planet, the children may still be taught about many things...Mmm? Oh, we have guests. Good, good.I know, I know.You came to ask me something, right? Am I right? Cloud- It's about the Promised Land- Not really
It's about the Promised Land Elder Hargo...The Promised Land. So you want to know...?There is no one place called the Promised Land. That's what I believe.No no, it does exist. Hmmm...... you can say that too.In other words, it doesn't exist for us, but it did for the Ancients.The Promised Land is the resting place of the Ancients.The life of the Ancients is one continuous journey. A journey to grow trees and plants, produce animals, and to raise Mako energy.Their harsh journeys continued throughout their lives...The place they returned to after their long journey... Their burial land is the Promised Land.Huh? Supreme Happiness? I believe that, for the Ancients, it was the moment that they were able to return to their Planet,At that moment they were released from their fate, and gained their supreme happiness...At least that's what I believe. I really don't know whether or not it's the truth now.
Not really Elder HargoOh, that's not what you're here for?I'd appreciate it if you don't talk to me about such foolish things as legends and old wives tales.
Elder HargoBy the way, those that came with you are all at the Cosmo Candle.Are you leaving? GatekeeperLeaving already? But it appears your friends still want to learn more about the planet... In the Pub... Elder BugahMmm...What is it? Cloud- The story of the Ancients...- Nothing
The story of the Ancients... Elder BugahYou can't talk of the Ancients, without mentioning Professor Gast.He used to come here sometimes.He was a Shinra scholar who spent his life studying the Ancients.He was a serious person, never would have figured he'd be with the Shinra.Must've been about 30 years ago, when he found the corpse of an Ancient. He was elated!If I recall... he named it 'Jenova' and was doing a lot of research...One day, he showed up here, looking real distressed.He was mumbling something about Jenova not being an Ancient and that he'd done a terrible thing...He's been missing since then. I heard that he never went back to ShinraSo, if you ever see Professor Gast, I want you to tell him...That the old man that likes to drink in Cosmo Canyon, wanted to hear about the Ancients.Well, there's lots to talk about,but most things about the Ancients are all legend and folk tales, and no one knows the truth.
Nothing Elder Bugah...hmm. That's no fun... I wanna tell a story.
Elder BugahBy the way, your friends are all in front of the 'Cosmo Candle'Are you all leaving now? Cloud joins his friends by the Candle. Nanaki...... BarretCosmo Canyon... This's where AVALANCHE was born...I promised my guys someday... when we saved the planet from the Shinra, that we'd all go to Cosmo Canyon and celebrate...Biggs... Wedge... Jessie...Now they're all gone... died for the planet....Really? To save the planet?We all... we all hate the Shinra...Do I even got a to go on?Will they......... will they ever forgive me?...Right now, I really don't know. But I know one thing.If there's anything I can do, to save the planet... or the people livin' on it... Then I'm gonna do it!I don't care if it's for justice or revenge, or whatever. I don't care...... let 'em decide for 'emselves. He gets to his feet. Urrrrrgh! I'm gonna do it!!Again... Again... AVALANCHE's born again! AerithI learned a lot. The elders taught me many things.About the Cetra... And the Promised Land...I'm...... alone... I'm all alone now... CloudBut I'm...... we're here for you, right? AerithI know. I know, but... I am the only...... Cetra. CloudDoes that mean we can't help? Aerith...... TifaCloud...Bonfires are funny, aren't they?They make you remember all sorts of things.You know, Cloud. 5 Years ago.........It's nothing.No, forget. I'm afraid to ask... CloudWhat is it...? TifaIt feels like... it feels like you're going far away...You really, really are...... you... right? YuffieWhat a boring place, just like I thought. I wanna go somewhere! Let's go find some Materia! Cait SithI wonder how many years it's been... Gosh, it brings back memories...... Nanaki...Long ago....When I was still very small. We were all around this flame...No, never mind... CloudWhat happened? NanakiIt's about my parents.When I talk about my mother, I am full of pride and joy...And that's fine. ...But when I remember my father, my heart is full of anger... Bugenhagen...You really can't forgive your father...? NanakiOf course. He...... left mother for dead.When the Gi tribe attacked, he ran off by himself, leaving mother and the people of the Canyon! Bugenhagen...Come, Nanaki. There's something you should see. Nanaki...? BugenhagenThe place may be dangerous.Cloud. Will you and one other person come with us? Barret...Where're they going? AerithI wonder what he wants to show Nanaki...? TifaCan I go too? YuffieDoes he want to show him THAT? You know, maybe there's some Materia that's been passed on for generations in this Canyon!? Cait SithDangerous? Count me out...... Elder BugahMmm. I'm starting to feel good now. That bartender's cocktails always hit the spot. GatekeeperHm? If you're looking for Bugenhagen, he went to the Sealed Door.Remember, there's a steel door on the way to Bugenhagen's room.What's that door there for anyhow? It's been closed forever... Cloud and the others join Bugenhagen by the sealed door. BugenhagenHo Ho HooooAre we all set? Cloud- Yeah- Just a minute BugenhagenNot ready yet? Tell me when you are ready. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Shall we go? He hits a switch to open the door. All right. Come in, come in. NanakiHey? Aren't you going with us, Grandpa? BugenhagenWhat are you crazy? It's dangerous in there. I told you that!You want an old man like me should go first? I'll be right behind you. If you try to go back out... BugenhagenWhat is it, you're going back? I'll be waiting here for you when you're ready.I can't leave this door open forever.Good. Then we shall proceed. They enter the cave and climb to the bottom. After passing through the first chamber, Bugenhagen stops in the doorway. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo.Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe. Killed in a certain battle. NanakiA certain battle...? BugenhagenThe vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear, and couldn't return to the Lifestream...We still have far to go. Ho Ho Hoooo. They continue on through the second chamber, and Bugenhagen stops again. BugenhagenAs you can see, this cave leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon.It was unfortunate that the Gi were larger than us. If they attacked through here, we wouldn't have stood a chance. Nanaki...... BugenhagenLet's move on. They move through the third chamber. BugenhagenThis warrior went through the cave all alone.Fighting attackers one after another... NanakiGrandpa...... That warrior... BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo... We're almost there. They enter the final chamber, where an evil-looking face is blocking the far exit. BugenhagenWhat is this......? NanakiGrandpa, is he...!? BugenhagenAfter death... The ghosts of the Gi... Like stagnant air......This... can't be!! Cloud and the others fight the Gi Nattak. Bugenhagen...Thank you, Cloud. Because of you, we survived.Nanaki, you have grown strong, too. Nanaki......Oh yeah? BugenhagenNow I know that it wasn't a mistake bringing you here...Come, I have something I want to show you. Right over here. They continue out of the cave. NanakiThis is... Bugenhagen...The warrior who fought against the Gi.He kept them from taking even one step into Cosmo Canyon.But he was never able to return to town...Look, Nanaki. Look at your father, at the warrior, Seto. Nanaki looks up to where Seto stands on the cliff above, turned to stone. Nanaki...That... That's...... Seto...? BugenhagenSeto continued to fight the Gi tribe here. ...To protect this Canyon.Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows turned his body to stone......Even after they all ran away... Seto, continued to protect us.And he continues to protect us, even now. NanakiEven now... BugenhagenYou thought that he was a coward and ran away. But he, alone risked his life to protect Cosmo Canyon.That is your father, Seto. NanakiThat...... that is Seto? ...!? Did mother know? BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo... She knew. The two of them made me promise to keep this cave shut.They asked me to seal it myself and not to tell a soul.They said we should forget about this cave. Nanaki......... BugenhagenCloud... Would you mind leaving the two of us alone? Cloud nods and leaves the cave. BugenhagenNanaki. I want you to continue your journey with Cloud and the others. NanakiGrandpa!? BugenhagenListen, Nanaki.Cloud says they are trying to save the planet.Honestly, I don't think it can be done.For even if they stop every reactor on the planet, it's only going to postpone the inevitable.Even if they stop Sephiroth, everything will perish.But, Nanaki. I've been thinking lately.I've been thinking if there was anything WE could do,as a part of the planet, something to help a planet already in misery...No matter what happens, isn't it important to try?Am I just wishing against fate?I am too old to do anything about it...This year, I'll be 130. Ho Ho Hoooo.That is why, Nanaki, you must go with them! For my sake. NanakiGrandpa... BugenhagenI wanted to show you your real father before you left...I'm so glad that you came back while I was still alive to show you. NanakiGrandpa... don't talk like that. I don't want to think of life... without you...... BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Well, I've had a long life. NanakiGrandpa! You must live!I'll see to it.I'll see to what's happening to the planet. And I'll come back to tell you. BugenhagenNanaki... NanakiI am Nanaki of Cosmo Canyon! The son of the warrior, Seto!I'll come back a warrior true to that noble name! So please, Grandpa... He turns and looks up to see that Seto is crying. BugenhagenThat's... Seto's...... Seto...... NanakiSeto....... Fa... Father... He leaps up higher and lets out a keening howl. Back outside, the others are gathered around the Cosmo Canyon. BarretThey said they finished fixin' the buggy. CloudShall we get going? AerithSo this is it, Nanaki... BarretThat's just the way it goes. ...You came in handy at times... ManThe repair on your car is completed.Now you should be able to go where ever you want. Cloud- How much do I owe...?- Much obliged
How much do I owe...? ManNo charge! You'd do the same for me, right? Cloud- Please, take 1000 gil- I guess you're right
Please, take 1000 gil ManAre you sure...? Well, all right. Thank you.Oh yeah. Did you stay at the inn already?There was a bottle on the sofa there a couple of days ago... was it yours?
I guess you're right Nothing happens.
Much obliged Nothing happens.
ManMmm...... I think the teachings of the 'Study of Planet Life' are true.But can people used to Mako energy ever go back...? Kid outside Sealed DoorNope... It doesn't open... How'd he seal it? With a huge magnet? Cloud starts for the gate, and Nanaki comes running after him. NanakiWait for me! I'm coming too! CloudMmm? BugenhagenCloud. Please look after Nanaki. CloudWhat happened? NanakiI think I grew up a little. That's what happened! He runs off down the steps. BugenhagenHo Ho Hoooo. Come back whenever you need my knowledge. Cloud and the others return to the buggy and continue north.
